from dpct.core import say_hello
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%nbdev_export
def say_hello_func(to):
    "Say hello to somebody"
    return f'Hello {to}!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hello("there")

'Hello there!'
